4305540.name: Florani Match
4305540.description:
FLORANI MATCH

Combine creatures and flowers to trigger exciting synergies in this cozy hand drawn roguelike puzzler. Discover and collect hundreds of Florani to unlock new combos and power ups.

STRATEGIC MATCH-3 ROGUELITE

Match adorable animal-flower hybrids in this deceptively deep puzzle game. Limited swaps and harvests per round make you think carefully about every move.

Match 3+ of the same animal for a basic score and  Match 3+ of same animal AND flower for Bonus points!  Create perfect matches to discover new Florani for your almanac!

DISCOVER & COLLECT 400 UNIQUE FLORANI

Create perfect matches during any run to discover and win runs to collect them!

DEEP STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY

  • Limited swaps per round - make every move count

  • Escalating target scores - survive 10 rounds to win

  • Strategic power ups - knight swaps, diagonal moves, range-2 swaps

  • Shop between rounds - build your strategy by combining Florani abilities and watch the beautiful phenomena of "number go up"

  • Endless mode - push for high scores

Rounds: 3-10 minutes Full runs: 20-60 minutes Content depth: dozens of hours to collect all Florani!

CHARMING HAND-DRAWN ART

Every Florani is hand-crafted with personality and charm. The cozy aesthetic masks genuinely challenging strategic gameplay.

FREE CONTENT UPDATES

More Florani coming in future updates - the collection keeps growing!

TRY THE DEMO

Available during Steam Next Fest (Feb 24 - Mar 3)

Can you discover them all? Can you collect them all?
